//IconPath <Path to JPG/PNG/BMP/ICO/EXE/ETC. Should pull Icons out of EXEs. Should.>
//EXEPath <Path To GameEXE, NOT INCLUDING IT!>
//GameEXE <Actual Game EXE File>
//CommandArgs <Command Arguments For The Launch EXE>
// CMD Args - Automatically replaced: %SCREENX%, %SCREENY%, %TIME, %DATE%, %USERNAME%
//MonitorRunning <True/False>
//MonitorEXE <EXEName if different than GameEXE>
//GameUID <Generated by LanParty>
//InstallerPath <Path To Installer EXE, relative>
//InstallFirst <True/False>
//GameType <0=Normal game/1=Non-game command, ie: "EXPLORER http://google.com" (opens Google)>
